> <OLD>
>
> Nightshift gives Wing Caliber the device to view on screen.  He crosses his
> fingers hoping that it did what he intended it to do.
>
> " Let's hope we got someth'n .  I wasn't too close when I deployed it but
> within range for it ta pick up Dark Rodimus's IFF.  Even if that over rated
> hot rod gets his tailpipes outa that mean phase of his, no way I'm gonna
> trust him anymore. I seriously hope we can retrieve the Matrix and get it
> outa that backstabber before it's too late."

<NEW>

There is smile from WING CALIBER as he takes the device and examines
it for a moment. Then with a nod he presses a few buttons and slides
it into the recieiving section of his computer console.

With a few deft movements he activates the final sequence of commands
and turns to look at the screen . . .

The screen is black, a single phrase bouncing along the screen reading
'no signal'.

"Slag." LEO said out loud before he looked embarrased and glanced at
NIGHTLIGHT and ELITA. "I meant . . . aw nuts! . . . What happened?"

WING SABER looked at the screen for a moment confusion clearly on his
face. "The machine was clearly picking up something it had a
location." he stepped back to the console as he manipulated a few
other controls. "Let's see what it recorded."

The screen goes from being black to a replay of the scene where DARK
RODIMUS was facing down SCOURGE, the Sweeps, NIGHTSHIFT and STRAIGHT
SHOT. The screen got bigger as the minicam approached DARK RODIMUS, in
the corner were cordinates indicating where they were at the time.

Then the screen went black, presumably where DARK RODIMUS vanished
from sight and then the screen went black again.

"That didn't show us much." LEO said, clearly getting preturbed.

"Patience." WING CALIBER said as he carefully reran the scene in slow
motion. He zipped back the point where DARK RODIMUS vanished and ran
it again slowly.

"Look!' WING CALIBER said as he pointed at the corner of the screen
that showed coordinates.

In the corner the cordinates changed. One moment they were showing the
cordinates of where the Dinosaurs had been and the stand off had
occured. Then for a micro second they showed something else, and then
went blank.

"Rewind that." LEO said, his voice more interested this time.

The scene backed up second by second until if finally showed the new
cordinate. "We GOT HIM!" LEO said as he smacked one fist into the
other.

"Not so fast." WING CALIBER said. "We only have a partial cordinate.
But we can now get close."

(TAG)

Preston
